content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position 0,0 to 2,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) producing iron plates
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) producing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position 4,4)
- Stone furnace producing copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5-12.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5 to -2.5, 22.5-28.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler (positions -9.5 to -7.5, 22.5-24.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam pipe at (-5.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network extending from (4.5,8.5) to (0.5,26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Lab Placement and Access
- Cannot place lab at (0.5, 28.5) because an entity already exists there
- Issues accessing lab at (0.5, 28.5) - ensure proper initialization and access methods

### Resource Management Errors
- Running out of coal for inserting into boiler - maintain adequate coal supplies
- Monitor fuel levels in critical machinery (boilers, furnaces)

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Remove existing entities if you need to place something in their position

### Research System Issues
- Ensure lab is properly placed and accessible before attempting research operations
- Verify lab entity exists and is properly initialized before attempting to interact with it
